page.title: 07Balmullo Sports/Gala Day
page.content:
One of the highlights of life in Balmullo is the Sports and Gala Day which takes place on the first Saturday in June. This is a new tradition, having taken place only for the past six years, but it is now established as a very popular day for local inhabitants.
There has been a Sports Day for several years at which various races and sports are enjoyed. One of the main features is the Hill Race, in which the young people of the village run up the nearby hill and back to the playing fields, where the sports day is held.
